remarks: Existence of an existentially restricted class abstraction. ` ph ` normally has free-variable parameters ` x ` , ` y ` , and ` z ` . Compare ~ abrexex2 .  (Contributed by NM, 20-Sep-2011.)
statement:
ab2rexex2.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
ab2rexex2.2 $e |- B e. _V $.
ab2rexex2.3 $e |- { z | ph } e. _V $.
ab2rexex2 $p |- { z | E. x e. A E. y e. B ph } e. _V $.
$d A x z $.
$d B y z $.
